oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Department of Energy Photograph Collection
House of Vision
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Two young men dressed in laboratory coats work with machines at a table in front of a wall filled with supplies.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Interiors; Optical industry; Stores and shops; Teenagers
Ainsworth, Guy; Ellis, Joe
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: See Oak Ridge Journal of September 27, 1945. "Diversified Occupations-Course provides Oak Ridge High School students with practical on-the-job training. Here Guy Ainsworth, left, and Joe Ellis earn High School credits while working in the House of Vision."
PRO 1014-1; 9-1945; House of Vision; Jay Ainsworth; Joe Ellis
